sentence:
• Demandware, Inc's ( DWRE ) shares jumped 55.9% on news that the company will be acquired by salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) for $75 per share or $2.8 billion in cash
• Shares of Lands' End, Inc. ( LE ) fell 5.7% after reporting fiscal first quarter loss of $0.18 per share, in contrast to a gain of $0.05 per share year-over-year
• Workday, Inc's ( WDAY ) shares increased 2% after posting fiscal first quarter revenues of $345.4 million, rising 38% year-over-year
• Shares of Boyd Gaming Corporation ( BYD ) advanced 2.7% on news that MGM Resorts International ( MGM ) inked a definitive agreement to acquire Boyd Gaming's 50% stake in Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa
